# LocalizationHelper.GetLocalizables method

Retrieves localizables from a string.

```csharp
public static List<LocalizableItem> GetLocalizables(string input, 
    List<LocalizableItem> localizables = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| input | String from which the localizables should be retrieved |
| localizables | Pre-existing localizables. |

## Return Value

List of localizables.
